publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Psalms 53
ab.l: Č́eb́ar avaz ḱot́uŕuv́č́uǵa maḥlat üśt́uńa aqyl- latadoɣon miźmor David́ǵa. Ajtty ńeḱaś üŕagińd́a joḥtur qorḥuvu Teńriniń č́ejpadylar da jereńči et́tiĺar avanlyḥ iš́- ĺariń joḥtur qyluvču jaḥšyny.
Vaĺe Teńri ḱokĺard́ań baɣadyr adam ulanlary üśt́uńa ḱorḿa barmudur aqylly iźĺav́č́u Teńrini.
Barysy qalp boldu bird́ań bulɣandylar joḥtur qyluvču jaḥšyny joḥ- tur daɣy bird́a.
Muna biĺḿejmodularmo qyluvčyular avanlyḥny ašav- čular ulusumnu aĺej ńečik ašadylar et́ḿakni vaĺe Teńriǵa čaɣyr- madylar.
Anda qorḥarlar qorḥuv joǵedi andyj qorḥuv ki Teńri tozdurur śuv́akĺariń qonuvčularnyn üśt́uńa ujatly et́arsiń ki Teńri ḥor et́ar alarny.
Kim b́erśajedi Cijjondan jarlyɣašlaryn Jiš́raʾeĺ- niń qajttyrɣanda Teńri qajtuvun ulusunun quvanyr Jaʿaqov bijanir Jiš́ra- ʾeĺ.
